cargo.cargoInsurance: Cargo Insurance provides cover on all risk terms for physical loss or damage to cargo during transport by land, sea or air.
cargo.conditionFirst: When you ship goods from outside the European Union (EU), you may be charged customs duty and/or VAT. You can either handle the customs on your own, or have it handled for you.
cargo.conditionSecond: To cover our costs when we present your goods to the customs authorities – and pay any customs duty or VAT due on your behalf – we charge a clearance / handling fee. The fee depends on the value of the goods you are shipping, and can be found here to the right.
cargo.costEffective: A cost effective and simple way to cover for physical loss or damage to goods in transit.
cargo.effectiveInsurance: Insurance is a cost effective and simple way to cover for physical loss or damage to goods in transit.
cargo.euRules: When you ship goods from outside the European Union (EU), you may be charged customs duty and/or VAT according to local regulations.
cargo.insuranceContact: Please contact your local {{tenantName}} office for more info.
cargo.noCustomsHead: A customs declaration is mandatory to pass a national border when exporting or importing. If you choose to handle the customs clearance on your own,
cargo.noCustomsTail: will need a copy of the customs declaration.
cargo.quoteInsuranceNoTail: to quote insurance for my cargo
cargo.quoteInsuranceTail: to quote insurance for my cargo

landing.benefits: There are tons of benefits of managing your logistics online:
landing.descriptionShopHead: Enjoy the most advanced and easy to use
landing.descriptionShopTail: in the market. Finally, shipping is as simple as it should be.
landing.descriptionQuoteHead: Enjoy our modern and easy to use
landing.descriptionQuoteTail: right away. Finally, shipping is as simple as it should be.
landing.offersOverview: Get an instant overview of available offers
landing.reuseShipments: Reuse old shipments and store addresses
landing.showStats: Pull statistics and reports on your logistics
landing.title: Introducing Online Freight Booking Services
landing.viewDocuments: View or download documents when you need them

shipment.noShipmentExplaination: As shipments are requested, they will appear here
shipment.rejectWarningHead: This will reject the requested shipment
shipment.rejectWarningTail: This shipment can still be recovered after being ignored
shipment.customsExportPaper: When you ship goods from Germany the Customs Export Paper is required to pass through customs
shipment.customsExportPaperTwo: A Customs Export Paper (ADB) is mandatory for all shipments when exporting from Germany.
shipment.customsExportPaperThree: If you choose to secure your Customs Export Paper on your own,
shipment.customsExportPaperFour: will need a copy of the Customs Export Paper.
shipment.customsExportPaperFive: to secure my Customs Export Paper (ADB)
shipment.kusterOne: Küster Speedtrans Übersee Spedition GmbH will organise the ABD on your behalf.
shipment.kusterTwo: Initially USD 75.00 will be added to your booking. This includes 1 customs tariff number.
shipment.kusterThree: For each extra we will charge you USD 12.50 per customs tariff number.

errors.oneChar: Must be at least one character long

dangerousGoods.partlyDangerous: Cargo partly consisting of above can also be DGR
dangerousGoods.noDangerousFirst: We currently do not offer freight rates for hazardous cargo in our Web Shop.
dangerousGoods.noDangerousSecond: Please contact our customer service department to place an order for your dangerous cargo:
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsOne: are materials or items with hazardous properties which, if not properly controlled,
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsTwo: present a potential hazard to human health and safety, infrastructure and/ or their means of transport.
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsThree: The transportation of dangerous goods is controlled and governed by a variety of
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsFour: different regulatory regimes, operating at both the national and international levels.
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsFive: Prominent regulatory frameworks for the transportation of dangerous goods
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsSix: include the United Nations Recommendations on the Transport of Dangerous Goods, ICAO’s Technical Instructions,
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsSeven: IATA’s Dangerous Goods Regulations and the IMO’s International Maritime Dangerous Goods Code.
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsEight: Collectively, these regulatory regimes mandate the means by which dangerous goods are to be
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsTen: Regulatory frameworks incorporate comprehensive classification systems of hazards to provide a taxonomy of dangerous goods.
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsEleven: Classification of dangerous goods is broken down into nine classes
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsTwelve: according to the type of danger materials or items present;
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsFourteen: batteries are used in many electronic devices such as
dangerousGoods.dangerousGoodsFifteen: cameras, cell phones, laptop computers, medical equipment and power tools.

optout.useRequiredTenant: Use of the {{tenantName}} ItsMyCargo webshop requires accepting the terms and conditions laid out by {{tenantName}}.
optout.useRequiredIMC: ItsMyCargo webshop requires accepting the terms and conditions laid out on the Terms and Conditions page.
optout.withdrawWarningHead: As such if you decide to withdraw your agreement to the terms and conditions you will not
optout.withdrawWarningTail: be able to continue using the shop and we will have to close the window
optout.agreeAgainTenant: Should you wish to resume using the {{tenantName}} ItsMyCargo Shop you will need to agree to the terms and conditions again
optout.agreeAgainGeneral: Should you wish to resume using one of the ItsMyCargo Shops you will need to agree to the terms and conditions again
optout.optOutActionHead: By clicking the Opt Out button below the following will happen:
optout.accountMarked: Your user account will be marked as not agreeing to the {{tenantName}} Terms and Conditions
optout.nonConsenting: Your user account will be marked as not consenting to the use of cookies
optout.optOutActionTail: You will be logged out and returned to the landing page

cookies.allWebshops: All ItsMyCargo webshops use Cookies to help make our services better.
cookies.reasonsForCookiesHead: Though we do not use cookies to track your movements through out the web
cookies.reasonsForCookiesTail: we do need to save some information about your profile and the data you are accessing in the browser.
cookies.infoIsVital: This information is vital to the functioning of the site.
cookies.useDiscontinuedHead: As such if you decide to withdraw your consent to the use of cookies you will not be able
cookies.useDiscontinuedTail: to continue using the shop and we will have to close the window.
cookies.useContinued: Should you wish to resume using one of the ItsMyCargo Shops you will need to consent to the use of cookies again
